title: Check the Box for Homeless Veterans Act of 2013
content: Check the Box for Homeless Veterans Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) establish in the Treasury the Homeless Veterans Assistance Fund. And (2) allow individual taxpayers to designate on their tax returns a specified portion of any overpayment of tax, and to make a contribution of an additonal amount, to be paid over to such Fund to provide services to homeless veterans.
